page.title: 02 INDUSTRY IN OUR AREA CONTD
page.content: EMU |GARDEN | 60+ |1978 GARDENTIME|FURNITURE | | ----------|------------|-------|------- HUNTER |FRUIT & | 800 |1955 SAPHIR |VEGETABLES | | ----------|------------|-------|------- Most of the companies covered by our survey distribute outside this county. C.F.Doyle distribute all over the world,Frank & Whitmore distribute as far as the Middle East,Gilletts,Emu and Hunter Saphir all distribute to Cornwall and Scotland.Both breweries distribute about 70 miles from Faversham. The annual turnovers range from 800000 (Frank & Whitmore) to 65 million pounds (Hunter Saphir). (This was written and presented by J.Bright & T.Drywood-Elvy) (The information on this disc was entered by the presenters)
